price: 28. Nous ne t’avons envoyé à l’ensemble des hommes que pour faire heureuse annonce et avertir. Mais la plupart des hommes ne le savent pas.
arabic: وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ إِلَّا كَآفَّةٗ لِّلنَّاسِ بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā arsalnāka illā kāffatan lilnnāsi bashīran wanadhīran walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
